title: Drawing, Design for stained glass, late 19th century
medium: brush and gouache, watercolor on paper mounted on tan illustration board
dimensions:
Image: 5.6 x 15.4 cm (2 3/16 x 6 1/16 in.)
Sheet (irregular): 29.2 x 17.1 cm (11 1/2 x 6 3/4 in.)
description: Design of arched window with separate panels, all framed by orange and red; two vertical panels identical designs of spade-shaped pattern with purple vines, mandorlas at center of yellow ground, with C-scrolls below. Upper circular panels contains 4-lobed flower in purple and green.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Design for stained glass, late 19th century. brush and gouache, watercolor on paper mounted on tan illustration board. Gift of Alice C. Morse. 2009-6-39.
